column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday October 11 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Bluegrass Pkwy at the KY River Bridge in Anderson Co:
column4: All eastbound lanes are shutdown on the KY river bridge due to a semi fire.
Tuesday October 11 at 7 p.m. at Rupp Arena.  Doors open at 5:30 p.m.
Use added caution if traveling downtown this evening and watch for pedestrians.
